titleStmt.title: A choice collection of law books ancient, and modern consisting of the library of Henry Parker, Esq., of Grays-Inn deceased : as also of another eminent professor of the law ... will be exposed to sale by way of auction, on ... the 5th day of December, 1681 ... / by Edward Millington.
titleStmt.author: Millington, Edward, d. 1703.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
